programme.title: NBA Countdown
programme.desc: "NBA Countdown" serves as the primer for game telecasts on the ESPN family of networks. It's highlighted by a lively roundtable discussion and debate of the top storylines around the league. Seats at the table are reserved for folks in ESPN's stable of NBA hosts and analysts, with the latter group imparting wisdom based on their many years of playing experience.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Nuggets tip off with the Eastern Conference-leading Celtics. Denver rang in a new era versus Boston with a 123-111 triumph on New Year's Day in 2023, snapping a six-game series slide. Denver star Nikola Jokic provided a signature triple-double.

programme.title: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: From Crypto.com Arena in Los Angeles.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 9 Bears (14-3, 3-1 Big 12) try to bounce back when they visit the Longhorns (12-5, 1-3). Baylor's five-game win streak came to an end as Kansas State forced overtime and earned a 68-64 win on Jan. 16. Baylor is 13-2 versus Texas since 2016.

programme.title: Postseason NFL Countdown
programme.desc: A review of the NFL playoffs and a look ahead to the Super Bowl.

programme.title: NFL Football
programme.desc: The divisional round begins with Lamar Jackson and the Ravens hosting C.J. Stroud and the Texans in the AFC. Rookie sensation Stroud led Houston to an overpowering wild-card win against Cleveland. Jackson is expected to win his second MVP.

programme.title: NFL on ESPN Postgame
programme.desc: NFL postgame.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. programme.title: UFC 297: Strickland vs. du Plessis - Prelims
programme.desc: Gillian Robertson vs. Polyana Viana, strawweight; Serhiy Sidey vs. Ramon Taveras, bantamweight; Charles Jourdain vs. Sean Woodson, featherweight; Brad Katona vs. Garrett Armfield, bantamweight. From Scotiabank Arena in Toronto.

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: Tyson puts fear into his opponents in this collection of his greatest matches.

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: Dominating performances from Tyson's early career.

programme.title: Postseason NFL Countdown
programme.desc: A review of the NFL playoffs and a look ahead to the Super Bowl.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Utes complete a homestand when the Ducks visit. Oregon has won 11 in a row, and 20 of the last 21, against Utah, with the lone loss coming in 2017. Jermaine Cousinard (ORE) averaged 14 points and four assists per game against Utah last season.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 10 Tigers try for their 29th straight win at home as they take on the SEC foe Razorbacks. LSU is 11-0 at the Maravich Center this season. The Tigers swept a pair of meetings in 2022-23 behind Angel Reese's total of 49 points and 35 rebounds.

programme.title: 2024 Australian Open Tennis
programme.desc: From Melbourne Park in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

programme.title: SportsCenter With Scott Van Pelt
programme.desc: SVP's up at midnight and bringing his unique perspective on games people play to "SportsCenter" viewers. The hourlong, late-night show is driven by the host's self-deprecating wit and passion for sports, with featured elements, including Van Pelt's nightly "1 Big Thing" commentary and a weekly look back at the moments that drove bettors wild in "Bad Beats." The show also delivers what "SportsCenter" fans are used to -- news and highlights, guests and interviews -- but in a different, fast-paced and insightful way.

programme.title: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith joins host Molly Qerim on this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Hosted by Tony Reali in the ESPN studio and joined via satellite by four panelists from across the country, the team debates popular sports stories. Reali acts as moderator, giving points for well-made arguments and deducting points for those who inspire him to hit the "mute" button. At the end of the show, whomever Reali deems the winner has 30 seconds without interruption to voice their final opinions on any topic they want.

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Rams (10-7, 2-2 A-10) aim to take advantage of the Billikens (8-9, 1-3) in this clash. Saint Louis could not prevent Dayton from extending its win streak to 11 games on Jan. 16, falling 70-65. VCU is 14-5 against Saint Louis dating back to 2010.

programme.title: 2024 Australian Open Tennis
programme.desc: From Melbourne Park in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

programme.title: NFL Matchup
programme.desc: An NFL Films production, "NFL Matchup" is definitely a show for football junkies. Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.title: NFL Matchup
programme.desc: An NFL Films production, "NFL Matchup" is definitely a show for football junkies. Unlike traditional football preview programs, this one gives fans an in-depth look at some of Sunday's games by breaking down the strategy and tactics -- the Xs and Os -- through the exclusive use of team-supplied footage. That type of film study is a forte of former NFL player and executive Louis Riddick and NFL Films producer Greg Cosell, whose work is featured here alongside host Sal Paolantonio.

programme.title: ESPN BET Live
programme.desc: ESPN Sports Betting Analysts Erin Dolan and Joe Fortenbaugh, along with host Tyler Fulghum, break down the biggest storylines through the lens of sports betting, with breakdowns, discussions and picks.

programme.title: College GameDay
programme.desc: "College GameDay" gets fans ready for all the day's action in men's college basketball with exclusive interviews, analysis, behind-the-scenes features and predictions. The primary host is Rece Davis, joined by analysts Jay Bilas, Seth Greenberg and LaPhonso Ellis. The show typically originates from the site of one of the day's biggest games.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Orange welcome the Hurricanes to upstate New York for an ACC affair. Miami has won three straight meetings by a combined eight points. Syracuse rebounded from a 36-point loss to North Carolina with a 69-58 triumph at Pittsburgh on Jan. 16.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Crimson Tide face the No. 6 Volunteers. Tennessee won last season's match versus then-No. 1 Alabama, 68-59. Zakai Zeigler matched the team high with 15 points and added eight assists in the win. Alabama is 0-3 versus AP Top-25 squads in 2023-24.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Bruins make their final trip to Tucson as a member of the Pac-12 to play the No. 12 Wildcats. Arizona won the last meeting, 61-59 in the 2023 Pac-12 Tournament final. Wildcats 7-footer Oumar Ballo had 13 points and eight rebounds in that game.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 25 Red Raiders (14-3, 3-1 Big 12) host the No. 20 Cougars (14-3, 2-2). BYU is 3-1 in the all-time series, but Texas Tech took the last matchup in 1995. Texas Tech's nine-game win streak ended with a humbling loss at No. 5 Houston on Jan. 17.

programme.title: 2024 Australian Open Tennis
programme.desc: From Melbourne Park in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed
programme.desc: When Khabib Nurmagomedov retired from MMA, the UFC's lightweight title was up for grabs. See the journey of the 155-pound belt following the Khabib Era, featuring Charles Oliveira, Dustin Poirier, Islam Makhachev, and more.

programme.title: 2024 Australian Open Tennis
programme.desc: From Melbourne Park in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

programme.title: 2024 Australian Open Tennis
programme.desc: From Melbourne Park in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia.

programme.title: NFL's Greatest Games
programme.desc: Tampa Bay Buccaneers at New Orleans Saints.

programme.title: NFL's Greatest Games
programme.desc: From Jan. 23, 2022.

programme.title: ESPN BET Live
programme.desc: ESPN Sports Betting Analysts Erin Dolan and Joe Fortenbaugh, along with host Tyler Fulghum, break down the biggest storylines through the lens of sports betting, with breakdowns, discussions and picks.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Green Wave (11-6, 2-3) try to pay back the No. 10 Tigers (15-3, 4-1) in American Athletic Conference play. Tulane claimed both regular-season meetings last season, but Memphis rolled to a 94-54 win in the semifinals of the 2023 AAC Tournament.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Mocs (11-7, 3-2 SoCon) aim to take advantage of the struggling Buccaneers (9-9, 1-4). East Tennessee State has dropped four in a row, though just one loss was at home. Honor Huff (UTC) is posting 15.6 points and 2.9 assists per game this season.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: A clash atop the Missouri Valley Conference pits the Racers (8-10, 5-2) against the Sycamores (15-3, 6-1). Murray State has won five of its last six outings to rebound from a 3-9 start to the campaign. The programs split last season's series.

programme.title: Golf
programme.desc: From Santa Maria Golf Club in Panama City, Panama.

programme.title: X Games Aspen 2024 Preview
programme.desc: A look ahead to exhilarating winter sports action at X Games Aspen 2024.

programme.desc: Unique and compelling feature stories from the world of sports.

programme.title: E60
programme.desc: A look the 1972 Miami Dolphins, who 50 years ago won Super Bowl VII, completing the first and only undefeated season in NFL history.

programme.title: Unsportsmanlike with Evan, Canty and Michelle
programme.desc: Start the day off right with Chris Canty, Evan Cohen and Michelle Smallmon providing an energizing and informative way to take on the day. Sports, life and laughter are what it's all about.

programme.title: ESPN BET Live
programme.desc: ESPN Sports Betting Analysts Erin Dolan and Joe Fortenbaugh, along with host Tyler Fulghum, break down the biggest storylines through the lens of sports betting, with breakdowns, discussions and picks.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Hoyas (8-9, 1-5 Big East) travel to take on the Musketeers (9-8, 3-3). Xavier has won back-to-back games, and looks ahead to showdowns with Creighton and UConn next week. Georgetown is 4-15 against Xavier since the Musketeers joined the Big East.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 11 Badgers host the Hoosiers. Wisconsin has won eight straight at home. During the 2022-23 matchup between the longtime Big Ten rivals, Indiana held Wisconsin to its lowest point total in the series since 1992 with a smothering 63-45 triumph.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Rebels try for a third straight win at Moby Arena when they link up with the Rams in Fort Collins, Colo. UNLV has won three of the past four versus Colorado State, with the lone setback coming by just one point in overtime Jan. 14, 2023.

programme.title: PokerStars Caribbean Adventure
programme.desc: Poker action from 2018.

programme.title: TMZ Sports
programme.desc: Gossip and exclusive stories about athletes' personal lives.

programme.title: TMZ Sports Weekend
programme.desc: Our news team constantly breaks exclusive stories featuring the biggest stars in sports.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Rebels try for a third straight win at Moby Arena when they link up with the Rams in Fort Collins, Colo. UNLV has won three of the past four versus Colorado State, with the lone setback coming by just one point in overtime Jan. 14, 2023.

programme.title: Bassmaster: the Cast
programme.desc: Jimmy Houston & Roland Martin were two of the early stars on the B.A.S.S tournament series, each with special qualities the drove them to the top of fishing fame.

programme.title: Bassmaster Review
programme.desc: The final two events of the 2023 Bassmaster Elite Series takes fishermen to New York for Lake Champlain and the St. Lawrence River, where history is made and records broken.

programme.title: Bassmaster Review
programme.desc: The path to qualify for the top-level Elite Series happens at the nine-event Bassmaster Opens. Watch anglers across the world compete to make the next step in the sport of bass fishing.

programme.title: Arena Motocross Nationals
programme.desc: Coverage of motorcycle racing action from around the world.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 18 Bluejays (13-5, 4-3 Big East) look to bounce back when they visit the Pirates (13-5, 6-1). Creighton is coming off a loss to No. 1 UConn on Jan. 17. Creighton swept three of the last four season series versus Seton Hall, including 2022-23.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Hawkeyes, winners of six of their past seven games, seek a better result when they host the No. 2 Boilermakers. A 25-point double-double from Zach Edey allowed Purdue to coast to an 87-68 triumph over Iowa to begin Big Ten play Dec. 4, 2023.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Blue Demons seek their first victory outside of Chicago when they visit the Bulldogs. DePaul is 0-6 when not playing in the Windy City. Since joining the Big East in 2013, Butler is 18-2 against DePaul and has won seven straight meetings.

programme.title: Women's College Basketball
programme.desc: The Aztecs carry a pair of three-game streaks into a matchup with the Spartans. San Diego State has won three in a row in the series after outscoring San Jose State by 45 points across two 2022-23 contests, but has dropped three straight overall.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 1 Huskies try for their third straight victory over the Wildcats in a Big East battle. Villanova won its first three conference games before dropping two of its last three. UConn claimed both meetings last season by a combined 20 points.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Hawkeyes, winners of six of their past seven games, seek a better result when they host the No. 2 Boilermakers. A 25-point double-double from Zach Edey allowed Purdue to coast to an 87-68 triumph over Iowa to begin Big Ten play Dec. 4, 2023.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 1 Huskies try for their third straight victory over the Wildcats in a Big East battle. Villanova won its first three conference games before dropping two of its last three. UConn claimed both meetings last season by a combined 20 points.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Trojans and Sun Devils meet for the final time in Arizona as Pac-12 adversaries. Arizona State snapped a seven-game series slide with a 77-72 upset in the 2023 Pac-12 Tournament quarterfinals. The programs have met regularly since 1979.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 17 Golden Eagles (12-5, 3-3 Big East) try to maintain their grip on the Red Storm (12-6, 4-3). Marquette has won four straight meetings. Junior guard Kam Jones (MARQ) averages 15.3 points per game and totaled 42 over his last two contests.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Hawkeyes, winners of six of their past seven games, seek a better result when they host the No. 2 Boilermakers. A 25-point double-double from Zach Edey allowed Purdue to coast to an 87-68 triumph over Iowa to begin Big Ten play Dec. 4, 2023.

programme.desc: The No. 1 Huskies try for their third straight victory over the Wildcats in a Big East battle. Villanova won its first three conference games before dropping two of its last three. UConn claimed both meetings last season by a combined 20 points.
